title: Implement advanced index in Python
description: Extend index.py with all lookup maps. Implement cache.py: save/load index to .cache/index.json, mtime-based staleness detection.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: implement advanced index cache in Python. Acceptance: cache read/write with mtime validation and tests.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Python cache utilities and tests. Ran: cd python && black . && ruff check . && pytest
